alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Lee; Mississippi; Phillips; Poinsett; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 25 at 8:25PM CDT until June 26 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 383 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST ARKANSAS CRITTENDEN CROSS LEE MISSISSIPPI PHILLIPS POINSETT ST. FRANCIS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN NORTH MISSISSIPPI ALCORN BENTON COAHOMA DESOTO LAFAYETTE MARSHALL PANOLA QUITMAN TALLAHATCHIE TATE TIPPAH TUNICA YALOBUSHA IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 19 COUNTIES IN WEST TENNESSEE BENTON CARROLL CHESTER CROCKETT DYER FAYETTE GIBSON HARDEMAN HAYWOOD HENDERSON HENRY LAKE LAUDERDALE MADISON MCNAIRY OBION SHELBY TIPTON WEAKLEY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALAMO, ASHLAND, BARTLETT, BATESVILLE, BLYTHEVILLE, BOLIVAR, BROWNSVILLE, CAMDEN, CHARLESTON, CLARKSDALE, COFFEEVILLE, COLLIERVILLE, CORINTH, COVINGTON, DRESDEN, DYERSBURG, FORREST CITY, GERMANTOWN, HARRISBURG, HELENA, HENDERSON, HOLLY SPRINGS, HUMBOLDT, HUNTINGDON, JACKSON, LEXINGTON, MARIANNA, MARKS, MARTIN, MEMPHIS, MILAN, MILLINGTON, OAKLAND, OLIVE BRANCH, OXFORD, PARIS, RIPLEY MS, RIPLEY TN, SELMER, SENATOBIA, SOMERVILLE, SOUTHAVEN, TIPTONVILLE, TUNICA, UNION CITY, WATER VALLEY, WEST HELENA, WEST MEMPHIS, AND WYNNE.
